title: Enhancing AI Practical Competencies: Digital Logical Competencies Through Flipped Learning and Self-Regulated Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can prepare for pre-class learning based on digital logic materials provided in a flipped classroom environment, achieving at least 80% completion.
Through reflective thinking activities, learners can review their weekly learning strategies and develop improved action plans at least three times.
Learners can enhance their problem-solving skills in digital logic circuit design by 20% through VR-based simulation tasks.
By applying self-regulated learning strategies (e.g., time management, maintaining focus), learners can achieve an average score of 85 or higher in project-based assessments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
